## Flyout.addBlockListeners\_() method

Add listeners to a block that has been added to the flyout.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected addBlockListeners_(root: SVGElement, block: BlockSvg, rect: SVGElement): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  root | SVGElement | The root node of the SVG group the block is in. |
|  block | [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg_class.md) | The block to add listeners for. |
|  rect | SVGElement | The invisible rectangle under the block that acts as a mat for that block. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
